entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ActionResult<T> type safety missing? #57605
  • Blazor Server App on iPhone Repeatedly Prompts for Windows Authentication #57603
  • Collocation JavaScript file breaks Hot Reload #57599
    9.0-rc2
  • Using MapGroup() with MapControllers() results in incorrect path in Swagger #57598
  • Installing .NET Core Hosting Bundle should be bullet-proof #57594
  • using garnet for ASP.NET Core SignalR scale-out #57591
  • Assembly.GetCallingAssembly() when update .net 3.1 to .net8.0 get Anonymously Hosted DynamicMethods Assembly #57590
  • Quarantine ComponentLifecycleMethodThrowsExceptionTerminatesTheCircuit, ComponentDisposeMethodThrowsExceptionTerminatesTheCircuit #57588
    9.0.0
  • TokenEndpoint empty when referencing Microsoft.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml nuget package #57586
  • [WebToolsE2E] Publish to Folder failed with error "Unable to copy file..." after adding scaffolding for 9.0 Blazor Web project. #57583
    9.0-rc2

Closed

  • Perf improvement: plaintext_spring #57584
  • Perf regression: json_middleware #57585
  • Content Section content not rendered on client if you turn off pre-rendering of the Interactive Server page #57574
  • AddMicrosoftIdentityWebApi ignores missing configuration #57596
  • `JwtBearerHandler` does not handle custom authentication schemes #57587
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #57542
  • Perf improvement: json #57577
  • Perf regression: plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #57578

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0] Quarantine two CircuitTests #57606
    area-blazor
  • Fix `E2ETest.ServerExecutionTests.CircuitTests.ComponentLifecycleMethodThrowsExceptionTerminatesTheCircuit` #57604
    area-blazor
  • Update branding to 8.0.10 #57601
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Update branding to 6.0.35 #57600
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • feat: extending `ApiBehaviorOptions` with skip `SkipStatusCodePages` #57597
    area-mvc, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Bump webpack from 5.93.0 to 5.94.0 #57592
    area-signalr, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • [release/9.0] Fix duplicate error.type on kestrel.connection.duration #57581
    Servicing-consider, area-networking

Merged

  • Quarantine two CircuitTests #57589
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.UI` package README #57580
    area-identity
  • [Blazor] Invoke inbound activity handlers on circuit initialization #57557
    area-blazor
  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.EntityFrameworkCore` package README #57537
    area-identity
  • Verify project template dependencies #57560
    area-mvc
  • Fix code generation for parsing optional array parameters in RequestDelegateGenerator #57336
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, feature-rdg, area-minimal, area-networking
  • Feature/httpendpoint #57565
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Improve performance of UriHelper.GetDisplayUrl #55611
    Perf, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Fix duplicate error.type on kestrel.connection.duration #57561
    area-networking
